title: The Reason for Getting It
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Ugh~! I’m so close!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>That was so close.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>But it fell in a position where I can easily hook the tab with the arm. I just need one... more... try!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Honoka-chan, you said that last try and couldn’t get it. Maybe we should go try a different machine?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Okay, just one more try!! I’ll get this time, so just hype me up!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>O-Okay! You can do it, Honoka-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I got it~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Congratulations~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Here, Riko-chan, this is for you~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Huh? Me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Maki-chan said these fluffy mittens are great~ It’s going to become colder soon, and a pianist needs to take care of her hands, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You did it for me!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ehehe, I just thought they’d be perfect for Riko-chan~! Plus, UFO catchers are fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Honoka-chan...... Thank you. I’ll make sure to wear them later!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
